name: CUBES (itch) (Psychic Snail Studios)
description:
Keep your plants from being squashed by shielding them with cubes!

Made in 4 days for the Brackeys 2021.1 game jam! All code and assets created by me for the jam.

Help:
Drag blue cubes from the oven onto the grid to shield your plants or on top of each other to combine them. You cant have a cube bigger than three!

Powerups: Red - Health; Gray: Sheild; Green: Time-slow; Orange: Oven boost;

For some odd reason, it is possible to get stuck in scene transitions sometimes, just reload the tab.
